tool_description: Schedules and manages automated meeting reminders for attendees with customizable timing and delivery methods.

meeting_id.description: Unique identifier of the meeting for reminder scheduling

attendee_emails.description: List of attendee email addresses to send reminders to

reminder_times.description: Minutes before meeting to send reminders (e.g., 1440 for 24 hours, 60 for 1 hour)

delivery_method.description: How to deliver reminders (email, sms, push, all)

error_messages: Meeting not found: Specified meeting_id does not exist in the system.
Invalid attendee emails: One or more email addresses are not in valid format.
Invalid reminder times: Reminder times must be positive integers representing minutes.
Invalid delivery method: delivery_method must be one of email, sms, push, all.
Reminder scheduling failed: Unable to schedule reminders due to system error.
usage: Provide meeting ID and attendee list. Optional settings include custom reminder timing and delivery methods. Returns confirmation of scheduled reminders.

scheduling_status.description: Status of reminder scheduling (success, partial, failed)
